<seg sID="C31_app59-fMS"/> travellers <seg eID="C31_app59-fMS"/> in <seg sID="C31_app61-fMS"/> desarts <seg eID="C31_app61-fMS"/> & barbarous <seg sID="C31_app63-fMS"/> countries <seg eID="C31_app63-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__17"/>are wont to <seg sID="C31_app65-fMS"/> meet – <seg eID="C31_app65-fMS"/> How I <seg sID="C31_app67-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29816"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29818"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29818"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29824"/>have <seg eID="C31_app67-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29824"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29816"/>lived I hardly <seg sID="C31_app69-fMS"/> know <lb n="c57-0157__main__18"/> <del rend="smear" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29830">for</del> <seg eID="C31_app69-fMS"/> many times <seg sID="C31_app71-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29833"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29835">did</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29838"/>have <seg eID="C31_app71-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29838"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29833"/>I <seg sID="C31_app73-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29843"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29845">lie</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="sublinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29848"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29850"><unclear reason="illegible">stretch</unclear></del> stretched my failing limbs<sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29848"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29843"/> <seg eID="C31_app73-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C31_app74-fMS"/> on <seg eID="C31_app74-fMS"/> the sandy <seg sID="C31_app76-fMS"/> plain <lb n="c57-0157__main__19"/>exhausted & far from succour, <seg eID="C31_app76-fMS"/> & prayed for <seg sID="C31_app78-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__20"/>death – <seg eID="C31_app78-fMS"/> But revenge kept me <seg sID="C31_app80-fMS"/> alive – <seg eID="C31_app80-fMS"/> I dared <lb n="c57-0157__main__21"/>not <seg sID="C31_app82-fMS"/> die <seg eID="C31_app82-fMS"/> & leave my adversary in <seg sID="C31_app84-fMS"/> being.— <seg eID="C31_app84-fMS"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__22"/>When I quitted <seg sID="C31_app86-fMS"/> Geneva <seg eID="C31_app86-fMS"/> my first <seg sID="C31_app88-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29869"> <unclear reason="illegible">a</unclear> </del> labour <lb n="c57-0157__main__23"/>was to gain some <seg eID="C31_app88-fMS"/>

Every thing was <seg eID="C31_app113-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C31_app114-fMS"/> silent <seg eID="C31_app114-fMS"/> except the <lb n="c57-0157__main__32"/>leaves of the <seg sID="C31_app116-fMS"/> trees <seg eID="C31_app116-fMS"/> which <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29966"/>were <seg sID="C31_app118-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29966"/> gentl<mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29969"/> <mdel>e</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29973"/>y<sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29973"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29969"/><mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29977"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e29979">rustled</del> <seg eID="C31_app118-fMS"/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e29982"/>agitated<sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29982"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e29977"/> by the <seg sID="C31_app120-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__33"/>breeze — <seg eID="C31_app120-fMS"/> The night was nearly <seg sID="C31_app122-fMS"/> dark and the <lb n="c57-0157__main__34"/>scene would have been <milestone spanTo="#c57-0157.09" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0157.10"/>even to an <w ana="start"/>unin<lb n="c57-0157__main__35"/>terested<w ana="end"/> observer <anchor xml:id="c57-0157.09"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0157.07" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0157.08"/>affecting and solem<mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30004"/><mdel>m</mdel><sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30008"/>n<sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30008"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30004"/> <anchor xml:id="c57-0157.07"/>–the <seg eID="C31_app122-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__36"/>spirits of the <seg sID="C31_app124-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30016"/> <mdel>d</mdel> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30020"/>departed<sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30020"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30016"/> seemed to flit <seg eID="C31_app124-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C31_app125-fMS"/> around <seg eID="C31_app125-fMS"/> and <seg sID="C31_app127-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30025"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30027"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30027"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30033"/>to cast <seg eID="C31_app127-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30033"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30025"/>a <seg sID="C31_app129-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0157__main__37"/><mod sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30039"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e30041">gentle</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e30044">hallow</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0157.03"/> <zone corresp="#c57-0157.03" type="left_margin" sID="c57-0157__left_margin"/> <addSpan spanTo="#c57-0157.06"/> <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__1"/>shadow <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__2"/>which <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__3"/>was felt but seen not<anchor xml:id="c57-0157.06"/> <zone eID="c57-0157__left_margin"/><mod eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30039"/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30063"/>a <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30063"/>round <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0157__main__d4e30066"/>the <sga-add eID="c57-0157__main__d4e30066"/> head of the mourner. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0157__main__d4e30069">But</del> <zone eID="c57-0157__main"/> <seg eID="C31_app129-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0158__main__1"/>the deep grief <seg sID="C31_app132-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0158__main__d4e30082"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0158__main__d4e30084">that I at first</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0158.01"/><lb n="c57-0158__left_margin__1"/>which this <lb n="c57-0158__left_margin__2"/>scene had <lb n="c57-0158__left_margin__3"/>at first <lb n="c57-0158__left_margin__4"/>excited<anchor xml:id="c57-0158.02"/><mod eID="c57-0158__main__d4e30082"/> <seg eID="C31_app132-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C31_app133-fMS"/> felt quickly gave <lb n="c57-0158__main__2"/>way to rage & <seg eID="C31_app133-fMS"/>
